QueryResult.text: select odf_ca_clr_key_metric.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_clr_key_metric where a.object_id = 5012581 and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = odf_ca_clr_key_metric.id UNION select odf_ca_clr_key_metric.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_clr_key_metric where a.object_id in (5012583) and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = odf_ca_clr_key_metric.odf_parent_id
